title: Multi-Vector Exploitation Challenge
description: A challenging scenario that combines web and server exploitation techniques.
hints: Consider how user input is reflected in the web application.
Research known vulnerabilities in older versions of VSFTPD.
Explore weak passwords for SSH access.
learningObjectives: Understand XSS attacks and how to exploit them.
Learn to identify and exploit FTP server vulnerabilities.
Practice SSH access through weak configurations.
